person.persName: Hazel G. Petree, Jr. (Elkton, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Elkton, Kentucky, attorney. Todd County, Kentucky, native. Son of Hazel G. Petree, Sr. and Sallie Petree. Married Mary M. Bristow Petree on May 16, 1854. Father of E. E. Petree, T. B. Petree, Mattie A. Petree, and Sallie Petree. Studied law with Francis M. Bristow at Elkton. Partner in a law firm with Bristow until 1864. Attorney in Todd County in 1850 and in Elkton in 1860.
